page.title: 10SHOPPING AND WORK SURVEY
page.content:
15% in Stourbridge. Those questioned preferred Worcester, Halesowen, and Brierley Hill to Hagley for buying clothes.
{Household Goods Hagley provides reasonable facilities for buying household goods. The most popular areas for these items are Kidderminster and Birmingham (26% each), with 20% in Stourbridge and 13% Hagley.
{Working Habits Only{10%}of those questioned{worked {in Hagley.}For those who work outside the village,{83%}of them travel{to {work by car,}covering an average daily mileage of 13 miles. People were attracted to Hagley by its good schools and attractive surrounding countryside.
